publicationstmt.publisher: Published by and available from the William Blake Archive, http://www.blakearchive.org

availability.p: 2009 Morris Eaves, Robert N. Essick, Joseph Viscomi.

projectdesc.p: These collection lists were prepared for the William Blake Archive.

tagsdecl.tagusage: The "num" element and its "type" attribute are used to encode important bibliographic information, including the states of engravings, the number of impressions, the copy designations, and the number of copies of a particular item. The "num" element and its "value" attribute are also used to encode significant bibliographic information, including whether an item is a proof or a posthumous impression or copy.>Describe usage of num element.

div1.p: Lists are provided only for collections with works published in the Archive.
